useEffect(()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');axios.get(`/api/game?patientId=${patientId}`,{headers:{'x-auth-token':token}}).then(resp=>{setResults(resp.data);// filtro inicial últimos 7 días
const now=new Date(),weekAgo=new Date(now);weekAgo.setDate(now.getDate()-6);setFrom(weekAgo.toISOString().slice(0,10));setTo(now.toISOString().slice(0,10));}).catch(console.error);},[patientId]);// Aplicar filtro de fechas
useEffect(()=>{if(!from||!to)return;const fDate=new Date(from),tDate=new Date(to);tDate.setHours(23,59,59,999);setFiltered(results.filter(r=>{const d=new Date(r.createdAt);return d>=fDate&&d<=tDate;}));},[results,from,to]);// Seleccionar primer resultado
useEffect(()=>{if(filtered.length)setSelected(filtered[0].createdAt);else setSelected(null);},[filtered]);// Calcular métricas
useEffect(()=>{if(!selected)return;const res=filtered.find(r=>r.createdAt===selected);setMetrics(res?computeMetrics(res,filtered):null);},[selected,filtered]);function computeMetrics(result,allResults){const slots=result.timeSlots||[];const activities=slots.flatMap(slot=>(slot.activities||[]).map(act=>({...act,slot:slot.slot})));const totalMin=activities.reduce((sum,a)=>sum+a.duration,0);// 1. Distribución %
const catSum={};activities.forEach(a=>{const c=categoryMap[a.activityId]||'Otros';catSum[c]=(catSum[c]||0)+a.duration;});const distribution=Object.entries(catSum).map(_ref=>{let[name,val]=_ref;return{name,value:+(val/totalMin*100).toFixed(1)};});// 2. Horas absolutas

const diversity=new Set(activities.map(a=>a.activityId)).size;// 4. Consistencia diaria

const periods={Mañana:[6,11],Tarde:[12,17],Noche:[18,23]};const pdSum={Mañana:0,Tarde:0,Noche:0};activities.forEach(a=>{const h=parseInt(a.slot.split(':')[0],10);for(let p in periods){const[s,e]=periods[p];if(h>=s&&h<=e)pdSum[p]+=a.duration;}});const timeOfDay=Object.entries(pdSum).map(_ref3=>{let[name,val]=_ref3;return{name,hours:+(val/60).toFixed(2)};});// 6. Balance por grupo
const grpSum={Autocuidado:0,Obligaciones:0,Ocio:0};activities.forEach(a=>{const cat=categoryMap[a.activityId]||'Ocio';const grp=groupMap[cat]||'Ocio';grpSum[grp]+=a.duration;});const groupBalance=Object.entries(grpSum).map(_ref4=>{let[subject,val]=_ref4;return{subject,value:+(val/totalMin*100).toFixed(1)};});// 7. Tendencia semanal
const trend=allResults.map(r=>{const acts=(r.timeSlots||[]).flatMap(sl=>sl.activities.map(a=>({...a,slot:sl.slot})));const total=acts.reduce((s,a)=>s+a.duration,0);const sums={Autocuidado:0,Obligaciones:0,Ocio:0};acts.forEach(a=>{const cat=categoryMap[a.activityId]||'Ocio';sums[groupMap[cat]||'Ocio']+=a.duration;});return{date:new Date(r.createdAt).toLocaleDateString(),Autocuidado:+(sums.Autocuidado/total*100).toFixed(1),Obligaciones:+(sums.Obligaciones/total*100).toFixed(1),Ocio:+(sums.Ocio/total*100).toFixed(1)};});// 8. Índice equilibrio global
const N=distribution.length;const uniform=1/N;const idx=1-distribution.reduce((acc,cat)=>acc+Math.abs(cat.value-uniform),0)/2;const balanceIndex=+idx.toFixed(2);// 9. Continuidad vs Caos
const sortedSlots=[...slots].sort((a,b)=>parseInt(a.slot,10)-parseInt(b.slot,10));const flatActs=sortedSlots.flatMap(sl=>(sl.activities||[]).map(a=>({category:categoryMap[a.activityId]||'Otros'})));let cont=0,trans=flatActs.length-1;for(let i=0;i<trans;i++){if(flatActs[i].category===flatActs[i+1].category)cont++;}const continuityRatio=trans>0?cont/trans:0;const continuityData=[{name:'Continuidad',value:+(continuityRatio*100).toFixed(1)},{name:'Caos',value:+((1-continuityRatio)*100).toFixed(1)}];// 10. Correspondencia Mié vs Sáb
const dayGroups={Miércoles:[],Sábado:[]};allResults.forEach(r=>{if(dayGroups[r.day])dayGroups[r.day].push(r);});function avgDist(arr){const sum={};let tot=0;arr.forEach(r=>{r.timeSlots.forEach(sl=>sl.activities.forEach(a=>{const g=groupMap[categoryMap[a.activityId]]||'Ocio';sum[g]=(sum[g]||0)+a.duration;tot+=a.duration;}));});const dist={};for(const
